name: MLB Perfect Inning: Ultimate
description:
Experience baseball the way it was meant to be played!
Welcome to the official MLB-licensed mobile baseball game endorsed by Jacob deGrom, one of the league's top starting pitchers!

[Game Introduction]
■ Officially Licensed by MLB
- Features the latest team logos, uniforms, rosters, and ballparks from the 2022 season.
- Perfectly recreated batting and pitching forms for star players.
- Lifelike face and body animations.
- Real MLB baseball in the palm of your hand.

■ Stunning Graphics
- A new game engine delivers cutting-edge graphics on a mobile device.
- Highly detailed skin tones and body gestures.
- See your favorite MLB players in full 3D.

■ Thrilling Real-Time PvP
- Play against users from all over the world.
- Outplay your opponent using strategy and ball control.

■ Upgraded Pitching/Batting Controls
- Upgraded controls let you choose how you want to play.
- Play on Auto or Manual based on your preferred style.

■ Fast Progress with Realistic Simulations
- Say goodbye to just looking at cards all day!
- Upgraded simulations make you feel like you're watching a live broadcast.
- Take in the excitement of the game as you listen to commentary of professional broadcasters.

This game is available in English, 한국어, 日本語, 中文繁體, Español

Minimum Requirements: iPhone 8 and above, iOS 12 and above

▶ Access Permissions
Requesting permission to provide the following services:

[Optional Permissions]
Camera: Permission to access Camera to take pictures that can be set as your profile image.
Photo Album: Permission to access Photo Album to upload pictures from your photo album to set as your profile image.
Push Notifications: Permission to send you Push Notifications in MLB Perfect Inning: Ultimate
Identifier for Advertisers: Permission to use Identifier for Advertisers (IDFA) for targeted advertising and tracking analysis.
※ Users are not required to allow optional access permissions. However, this will restrict access to related features.

▶ Revoking App Permissions
Users can reset or revoke permissions after granting access.
- Settings > Privacy > Select App > Permissions > Grant/Revoke Permission

** MLB Perfect Inning: Ultimate includes in-game purchases. Please note that some items require additional payments.
